record.title: STATEMENTS IN TRIBUTE TO SENATOR LOTT
record.narrative:
STATEMENTS IN TRIBUTE TO SENATOR LOTT -- (Senate - December 18, 2007)

[Page: S15935]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the tributes to Senator Lott in the Congressional Record be printed as a Senate document and that Senators be permitted to submit statements for inclusion in the Record until January 30, 2008.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
